griffon.core.resources

Interface ResourceResolver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroovyAwareResourceResolver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractResourceResolver, CompositeResourceResolver, DefaultGroovyAwareResourceResolver, DefaultResourceResolver, ResourceResolverDecorator

    public interface ResourceResolver
    Interface for resolving resources, with support for the parameterization and internationalization of such resources.
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray, Alexander Klein

    • Field Summary

      Fields

    • Method Detail

      • resolveResource

        @Nonnull
Object resolveResource(@Nonnull
                                String key)
                         throws NoSuchResourceException
        Try to resolve the resource.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        Returns:
        The resolved resource at the given key for the default locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchResourceException - if no resource is found

      • resolveResource

        @Nonnull
Object resolveResource(@Nonnull
                                String key,
                                @Nonnull
                                Locale locale)
                         throws NoSuchResourceException
        Try to resolve the resource.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        locale - Locale in which to lookup
        Returns:
        The resolved resource at the given key for the given locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchResourceException - if no resource is found

      • resolveResource

        @Nonnull
Object resolveResource(@Nonnull
                                String key,
                                @Nonnull
                                Object[] args)
                         throws NoSuchResourceException
        Try to resolve the resource.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        args - Arguments that will be filled in for params within the resource (params look like "{0}" within a resource, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        The resolved resource at the given key for the default locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchResourceException - if no resource is found

      • resolveResource

        @Nullable
Object resolveResource(@Nonnull
                                 String key,
                                 @Nullable
                                 Object defaultValue)
        Try to resolve the resource. Return default resource if no resource was found.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        defaultValue - Message to return if the lookup fails
        Returns:
        The resolved resource at the given key for the default locale

      • resolveResourceConverted

        @Nonnull
<T> T resolveResourceConverted(@Nonnull
                                        String key,
                                        @Nonnull
                                        Class<T> type)
                                 throws NoSuchResourceException
        Try to resolve the resource. The value is converted to type T if found using a PropertyEditor.
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        type - the type to be returned
        Returns:
        The resolved resource at the given key for the default locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchResourceException - if no resource is found
        Since:
        2.5.0

                                         String key,
                                         @Nullable
                                         T defaultValue,
                                         @Nonnull
                                         Class<T> type)
        Try to resolve the resource. Returns default value if no resource was found. The value is converted to type T if found using a PropertyEditor.

      • resolveResourceValue

        @Nonnull
Object resolveResourceValue(@Nonnull
                                     String key,
                                     @Nonnull
                                     Locale locale)
                              throws NoSuchResourceException

        Resolve a resource given a key and a Locale.

        This method should use the default Locale if the locale argument is null. The key argument may refer to another key if the resolved value results in a CharSequence that begins with "@[" and ends with "]". In this case the method will use the enclosed value as the next key to be resolved. For example, given the following key/value definitions 

             some.key = Hello {0}
     other.key = @[some.key]

        Evaluating the keys results in 

            assert resolveResourceValue('some.key', Locale.default) == 'Hello {0}'
    assert resolveResourceValue('other.key', Locale.default) == 'Hello {0}'

        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'sample.SampleModel.icon'
        locale - Locale in which to lookup
        Returns:
        the resolved resource value at the given key for the given locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchResourceException - if no message is found

      • formatResource

        @Nonnull
String formatResource(@Nonnull
                               String resource,
                               @Nonnull
                               List<?> args)
        Formats the given resource using supplied args to substitute placeholders.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource following a predefined format.
        args - Arguments that will be filled in for params within the resource (params look like "{0}" within a resource, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        the formatted resource with all matching placeholders with their substituted values.

      • formatResource

        @Nonnull
String formatResource(@Nonnull
                               String resource,
                               @Nonnull
                               Object[] args)
        Formats the given resource using supplied args to substitute placeholders.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource following a predefined format.
        args - Arguments that will be filled in for params within the resource (params look like "{0}" within a resource, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        the formatted resource with all matching placeholders with their substituted values.

      • formatResource

        @Nonnull
String formatResource(@Nonnull
                               String resource,
                               @Nonnull
                               Map<String,Object> args)
        Formats the given resource using supplied args to substitute placeholders.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource following a predefined format.
        args - Arguments that will be filled in for params within the resource (params look like "{:key}" within a resource, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        the formatted resource with all matching placeholders with their substituted values.
